registry_info.merge_notes: 2024 version data takes precedence for overlapping use case IDs. Unique cases from 2021 have been preserved.

use_cases.name: Explainable artificial intelligence for genomic medicine
use_cases.description: AI system for genomic medicine with explainability features

use_cases.name: Improve clinical decision-making and risk assessment in mental healthcare
use_cases.description: To improve clinical decision-making and the accurate assessment of risks for individual patients of mental healthcare
use_cases.narrative: The solution has halved the time required for the preliminary assessment of patient records, increasing the time available for consultations
use_cases.challenges: The incorporation of many different types of data is revolutionizing the healthcare sector
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Incorrect decision and unexplainable result

use_cases.name: AI solution to calculate amount of contained material from mass spectrometry measurement data
use_cases.description: Calculating the amount of contained material from mass spectrometry measurement data using chromatography
use_cases.narrative: An AI solution was developed that can use deep learning to automatically pick the peak of contained material from measurement data
use_cases.challenges: Lack of training data per contained material, how to create good images for deep learning from mass spectrometry measurement data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Quality assurance solution based on AI, to detect defects on wind turbines blades
use_cases.description: Automatically detect defects in wind turbine blades through image optimization and deep learning-based recognition
use_cases.narrative: Transforms raw ultrasonic testing data into RGB images for deep learning analysis. Achieved >95% coverage for various defects while reducing evaluation time by 80%
use_cases.challenges: Achieving same accuracy as ultrasonic engineers; lack of defect data per type; creating good images from UT raw data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Human-machine hybrid approach for reliability; explainability through causal explanations

use_cases.name: Solution to detect signs of failures in wind power generation system
use_cases.description: Detect signs of malfunction (failure) in wind power generators
use_cases.narrative: A system is currently in development that uses machine learning to detect signs of equipment failure that would be difficult to detect from visual inspection
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Computer-aided diagnosis in medical imaging based on machine learning
use_cases.description: Detecting image anomalies
use_cases.narrative: The advances in image recognition technology enable the machine learning system to support diagnosis in medical imaging
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: AI ideally matches children to daycare centres
use_cases.description: Assignment system that satisfies applicants' complex requirements for daycare placement
use_cases.narrative: Uses game theory mathematical model to optimally assign children to daycare centres while accommodating family preferences and sibling requirements
use_cases.challenges: Complex sibling requirements; long calculation time for large numbers; unique rules per government
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Supporting working parents; resolving daycare waiting lists

use_cases.name: Deep learning technology combined with topological data analysis successfully estimates degree of internal damage to bridge infrastructure
use_cases.description: Estimate and detect the risk of catastrophic collapse of old bridges
use_cases.narrative: Development of sensor data analysis technology that can aggregate vibration data from sensors attached to the surface of a bridge, and then estimate the degree of the bridge's internal damage
use_cases.challenges: Conducting trials using vibration data from actual bridges, with the goal of real-world usage
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: False positives or negatives in damage assessment
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: AI components for vehicle platooning on public roads
use_cases.description: Trains of vehicles that drive very close to each other at nearly equal speed (platoons) on public roads
use_cases.narrative: The overall concept of automated platooning is that the lead vehicle would be driven as usual by a trained driver, and the following vehicles would be driven fully automatically by the system
use_cases.challenges: Highly unpredictable traffic environment, legislative situation, standardization
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: System security and reliability, risk of hacking
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Safety, system security and reliability, trust over system reliability

use_cases.name: Self-driving aircraft towing vehicle
use_cases.description: Self-driving towing vehicle for aircrafts, operating on an airfield autonomously
use_cases.narrative: Self-driving vehicle technology is applied to the problem of towing aircraft at busy airports from gate to runway and runway to gate
use_cases.challenges: Safe operations in the airfield environment, minimal changes to the airport infrastructure
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Vehicles expected to operate in a way that feels common and familiar to humans

use_cases.name: Unstaffed protective vehicle for road works on motorways
use_cases.description: Unstaffed operation of a protective vehicle in order to reduce the risk for road workers
use_cases.narrative: Mobile road works on the hard shoulder of German highways bear an increased accident risk for the crew of the protective vehicle safeguarding road works against moving traffic
use_cases.challenges: Safe operations in public traffic, compliance with ISO 26262
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Autonomous apron truck
use_cases.description: Automated transportation of luggage (carts) to requested destinations on an airport apron
use_cases.narrative: An AI solution was planned that can operate a luggage truck on an airport apron where it interacts with aircrafts, other machines and humans
use_cases.challenges: Detect other apron traffic participants including their intentions; multiplicity of various outside conditions; prediction of human behaviour
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Changed work environment for workers during loading/unloading

use_cases.name: AI solution to automatically identify false positives from a specific check for 'untranslated target segments' by an automated quality assurance tool
use_cases.description: The scope is limited to automated linguistic quality assurance tools
use_cases.narrative: Build an AI solution that can automatically identify likely false positive issues from the results of the 'check for untranslated target segments'
use_cases.challenges: Segmentation of false positive data according to the customer and product profile can be challenging
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Behavioural and sentiment analytics
use_cases.description: Ascertain a person's emotional state and goal from their gestures, facial expression, and actions
use_cases.narrative: Detect object theft and other criminal behaviours. Prevent undesired behaviours, adapt the narrative to suit the state of the person
use_cases.challenges: Surveillance cameras often have low resolution, and can be in poorly lit environments
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Right to privacy

use_cases.name: Generative design of mechanical parts
use_cases.description: Iterative design process to create optimized mechanical parts following precise constraints
use_cases.narrative: Generates lighter, stronger parts while reducing material costs through AI-driven iterative design optimization
use_cases.challenges: Engineers must define constraints properly; generated pieces can have overlooked design flaws
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Highly dependent on engineer input for constraints
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Requires highest reliability for modular design; security and accountability concerns

use_cases.name: Robotic prehension of objects
use_cases.description: Outputting the end effector velocity and rotation vector in response to the view from a RGB-D camera
use_cases.narrative: Use reinforcement learning to train the robot to grasp miscellaneous objects in simulation and transfer this learning to real-life robots
use_cases.challenges: The camera cannot have a bird's eye view and instead moves with the robot. Sparse rewards can complicate learning
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Safety risks to people and animals
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Prevent harm to people and animals near a robot

use_cases.name: Robotic vision â€“ scene awareness
use_cases.description: Determining the environment the robot is in and which actions are available to it
use_cases.narrative: Household robots are expected to navigate a very diverse set of environments and be able to accomplish different tasks depending on their position and action set
use_cases.challenges: The environment can be poorly lit, leading to difficult context recognition. Sensors can degrade
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Privacy concerns (what data from sensors is kept, reviewed and used)

use_cases.name: AI solution for car damage classification
use_cases.description: Car damage classification for common damage types such as bumper dent, door dent, glass shatter
use_cases.narrative: Image-based vehicle insurance processing is an important area with large scope for automation
use_cases.challenges: Small size of the damage, smaller quantity of data, ambiguity in damaged and non-damaged images
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Insurance agents may need to be re-skilled

use_cases.name: AI to understand adulteration in commonly used food items
use_cases.description: Understand the patterns in hyperspectral/near infrared (NIR) or visual imaging specifically for adulteration in milk, bananas and mangoes
use_cases.narrative: Food adulteration is one of the big challenges of modern society. Hyperspectral technology was evaluated to find out adulteration in food items
use_cases.challenges: Large scale data collection, miniaturization of frugal NIR/hyperspectral sensor
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: False accusations due to incorrect classification
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: If the AI system is rolled out and taken to be reliable, incorrect classification can lead to false accusations

use_cases.name: Detection of fraud based on collusion
use_cases.description: Unsupervised ML algorithms to detect collusion-based frauds in stock market trading
use_cases.narrative: Detects circular trading and price manipulation through graph clustering algorithms that identify heavy trading patterns among suspected colluding parties
use_cases.challenges: Actual fraud examples not readily available for evaluation
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect detection can cause unnecessary alerts and stress
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: False detections can cause stress in stock traders

use_cases.name: Information extraction from hand-marked industrial inspection sheets
use_cases.description: Localization and mapping of machine zones, arrows and text, to extract information from manually tagged inspection sheets
use_cases.narrative: We have proposed a novel pipeline to build an information extraction system for such machine inspection sheets, utilizing state-of-the-art deep learning and computer vision techniques
use_cases.challenges: Quality of images, structural deformities of individual components, quantity of data, cascading effect of errors
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Inspection engineers may need to develop other skills

use_cases.name: AI (swarm intelligence) solution for attack detection in IoT environment
use_cases.description: Anomaly-based attack detection in an IoT environment using swarm intelligence
use_cases.narrative: This is a unique approach to detect attacks in an IoT environment using anomaly-based attack detection that uses swarm intelligence methods
use_cases.challenges: Varied data sets for different scenarios, IoT nodes configuration for specific environments, flexibility for reuse
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Accuracy of the solution. Fraud detection usually entails a false positive alarm issue

use_cases.name: A recommendation system for industrial training
use_cases.description: Recommends personalized training courses based on employee career objectives
use_cases.narrative: Uses unsupervised sequence mining algorithms to analyze training history of 118,587 employees across 5,019 courses to provide personalized recommendations
use_cases.challenges: Large training datasets required; predicting human behavior is complex
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Bias in model training; incorrect use can stress employees
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Impact on employee motivation must be considered

use_cases.name: AI system to predict post-operative visual acuity for LASIK surgeries
use_cases.description: Predicts post-operative visual outcomes for LASIK surgeries using patient demographics and pre-operative data
use_cases.narrative: Regression model using 791 surgeries data to predict uncorrected visual acuity at 1 day, 1 week, and 1 month post-surgery with RMSE of 0.102, 0.094, and 0.074 respectively
use_cases.challenges: Large datasets difficult to obtain; many missing values; sparse data
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Bias in data sources; incorrect system use
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Explainability of predictions; patient data privacy; dataset bias

use_cases.name: Use of robotic solution for traffic policing and control
use_cases.description: Robotics-based traffic policing system
use_cases.narrative: Creation of a humanoid robot that can be deployed for traffic monitoring and control on roads
use_cases.challenges: Accurate control instructions are crucial for proper traffic control
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Addresses the pressing concern of effective traffic control

use_cases.name: Robotic solution for replacing human labour in hazardous conditions
use_cases.description: Building an AI-based robotics solution for replacing human labour in hazardous conditions
use_cases.narrative: Building an AI-based robotic solution enabled with computer vision and equipped with various sensors for effectively replacing human labour in risky work environments
use_cases.challenges: The solution is expected to be customizable for different work environments
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Addresses the issue of accidents in hazardous work environments

use_cases.name: Credit scoring using KYC data
use_cases.description: Building a risk scorecard for loan applicants using KYC data for better risk management
use_cases.narrative: If realized, it can be used to provide an objective score to all loan applicants, even new-to-credit ones
use_cases.challenges: KYC data obtained from very rural areas can be noisy, can have several missing values
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: We do not see any societal concerns if it is used

use_cases.name: Recommendation algorithm for improving member experience and discoverability of resorts in the booking portal of a hotel chain
use_cases.description: Personalized hotel recommendations to improve member experience and redistribute demand
use_cases.narrative: Hybrid recommendation algorithm that reshapes demand by promoting less visible hotels while considering member preferences from past holiday patterns
use_cases.challenges: Cold start problem with sparse interaction matrix; computational resource intensity
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Enhancing traffic management efficiency and infraction detection accuracy with AI technologies
use_cases.description: Big data AI for traffic monitoring, infraction detection, and flow optimization
use_cases.narrative: Multi-sourced data analysis achieving 10x increase in infraction detection efficiency with >95% accuracy, plus 9-25% increase in vehicle passing speed
use_cases.challenges: Improving hardware architecture; consistent interfaces; supporting new algorithms
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Low quality images; safety/security risks for traffic systems; privacy risks for vehicle tracking
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Serious safety, security and privacy concerns for traffic management and vehicle monitoring

use_cases.name: Autonomous network and automation level definition
use_cases.description: Communications network
use_cases.narrative: With the goal of providing common understanding and consensus for an autonomous self-driving network, this use case delivers a harmonized classification system
use_cases.challenges: Data usage and sharing, human expertise and competence
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure

use_cases.name: Autonomous network scenarios
use_cases.description: Communications network
use_cases.narrative: Multiple scenarios of an autonomous network enabled by AI are addressed for improving operational efficiency, customer experience and service innovation
use_cases.challenges: Data usage and sharing, human expertise and competence
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure

use_cases.name: AI system to help mobile phones to have better picture effect
use_cases.description: Deep learning system for smartphone camera image quality enhancement through scene and object recognition
use_cases.narrative: Recognizes 100+ scenes and 20+ object types to automatically adjust camera parameters for optimal photo effects, targeting professional SLR camera quality
use_cases.challenges: Achieving SLR camera quality; lack of data for certain scenes; limited device computing power
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Object detection bias could lead to racial prejudice or privacy issues

use_cases.name: Automated defect classification on product surfaces
use_cases.description: Image analytics for water taps in sanitary industries
use_cases.narrative: A vision system that inspects and identifies the defects on water taps in sanitary industries using a combination of features for automatic defect classification
use_cases.challenges: Real-time implementation, accurately identify the nature of defects
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Promoting sustainable industries, and investing in scientific research and innovation

use_cases.name: Robotic task automation: insertion
use_cases.description: Robotic assembly
use_cases.narrative: Control algorithms that are based on machine learning, especially those including reinforcement learning, can become alternative solutions
use_cases.challenges: Complex and unpredictable assembly processes due to imperfection of production steps, accuracy of sensing, coworking with humans
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Promoting sustainable industries and investing in scientific research and innovation

use_cases.name: Causality-based thermal prediction for data centre
use_cases.description: Data centre cooling control involving use of air cooling to control hot spots
use_cases.narrative: We seek to uncover the causal relationship between ACUs supplying cool air and temperature at the cabinets to prioritize which ACUs should be regulated
use_cases.challenges: Data sufficiency
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Equipment overheating due to incorrect predictions
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Promoting sustainable industries and investing in scientific research and innovation

use_cases.name: Powering remote drilling command centre
use_cases.description: Real-time processing of drilling rig sensor data for performance optimization
use_cases.narrative: Processes 170+ vital signals per second from oil rigs to provide real-time insights, automatic report generation, and asset utilization optimization
use_cases.challenges: Organizational compliance issues
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Performance efficiency improvements; reliability, accountability and security challenges

use_cases.name: Quality improvement of adhesive products, based on AI
use_cases.description: IoT signal intelligence platform for adhesive manufacturing quality control
use_cases.narrative: Uses 3+ years of sensor data from industrial mixers to predict quality failures and provide real-time process control with explainable models
use_cases.challenges: Patented process security restrictions
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Sustainability and environmental protection focus; efficiency improvements

use_cases.name: Machine learning-driven approach to identify weak spots in the manufacturing of circuit breakers
use_cases.description: Detecting issues in the manufacturing process that lead to early failure of circuit breakers
use_cases.narrative: An approach was developed that can mine manufacturing data related to circuit breakers through multiple machine learning algorithms
use_cases.challenges: Discovering actionable insight with a partial data set and managing bias in ML models due to limited number of failed cases
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Bias in ML models due to limited failure cases
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Safe and reliable power delivery

use_cases.name: Machine learning-driven analysis of batch process operation data to identify causes for poor batch performance
use_cases.description: Detecting issues in a batch manufacturing process that lead to bad quality products or longer cycle times
use_cases.narrative: An approach was developed that can use machine learning models to identify issues in batch manufacturing
use_cases.challenges: Discovering actionable insight with a limited industrial data set, handling dynamics in the process variables
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Consistent batch operation leads to enhanced productivity

use_cases.name: Empowering autonomous flow meter control - reducing time taken to 'proving of meters'
use_cases.description: ML-based prediction of VFD and FCV setpoints to reduce meter calibration time
use_cases.narrative: Reduces calibration time from 3-4 hours to minutes by predicting optimal valve settings with 98% accuracy using historical process data
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Sustainability and environmental protection; predictive maintenance capabilities

use_cases.name: Improving productivity for warehouse operation
use_cases.description: Big data analysis for enhancing productivity
use_cases.narrative: An AI-driven operating system that uses big data from work performance information to issue appropriate work instructions has been developed
use_cases.challenges: Understanding workers' human factors (privacy, additional work, etc.)
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Solving the labour shortage problem and improving labour-related issues

use_cases.name: Emotion-sensitive AI customer service
use_cases.description: Detects customer emotions and sentiment intensity to improve service quality
use_cases.narrative: Achieves 90% recall and 74% accuracy for sentiment classification across 7 categories, increasing customer satisfaction by 57%
use_cases.challenges: Limited training data; sentiment classification complexity; privacy concerns
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Low humanization; reducing human staff; privacy risks from customer data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Improving efficiency and experience while raising privacy concerns

use_cases.name: Deep learning-based user intent recognition
use_cases.description: Recognizes user intent for intelligent customer service chatbots
use_cases.narrative: Handles 90% of online customer service with 95% intent recognition accuracy, saving significant labor costs annually
use_cases.challenges: High semantic ambiguity; complex business logic; reasoning questions; privacy risks
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Semantic ambiguity; privacy risks related to user intent and training data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Efficiency improvements while raising serious privacy concerns about user intent knowledge

use_cases.name: Chromosome segmentation and deep classification
use_cases.description: Karyotyping of chromosomes is restricted to healthy patients
use_cases.narrative: We proposed a method to segment out and classify chromosomes for healthy patients using a combination of crowdsourcing, pre-processing and deep learning
use_cases.challenges: Crowd's job satisfaction and spamming in annotated data
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Inaccurate classification leading to patient stress
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Inaccurate classification of chromosomes can lead to stress in patients if not reviewed by expert doctors

use_cases.name: Anomaly detection in sensor data using deep learning techniques
use_cases.description: Temporal data captured from sensors
use_cases.narrative: We have proposed the use of deep learning algorithms for analysing such temporal patterns for anomaly/event detection, diagnosis, and root cause analysis
use_cases.challenges: Noisy data, data with missing temporal features, rarity of anomalous data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure

use_cases.name: Adaptable factory
use_cases.description: (Semi-)Automatic change of a production system's capacities and capabilities from a behavioural and physical point of view
use_cases.narrative: This use case describes rapid, and in some cases completely automated, conversion of a manufacturing facility
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Enabling flexible and autonomously reconfigurable production systems

use_cases.name: Order-controlled production
use_cases.description: Automatic distribution of production jobs across dynamic supplier networks
use_cases.narrative: A network of production capabilities and capacities that extend beyond factory and company boundaries allows for a quick order-controlled adaption
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Enabling mass-customized production in global dynamic supply chains

use_cases.name: Value-based service
use_cases.description: Process and status data from production and product use sources are the raw materials for future business models and services
use_cases.narrative: Service platforms collect data from product use and analyse and process this data to provide tailor-made individualized services
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: AI technologies provide solution for more reliable, fault-tolerant, safe and secure production systems

use_cases.name: AI system for traffic signal optimization based on multi-source data fusion
use_cases.description: Generates optimized traffic signal timing plans using fused data from multiple sources
use_cases.narrative: Analyzes internet, induction coil, and video data to increase average vehicle speed by 9% and reduce waiting time by 15%
use_cases.challenges: Large-scale intersection coordination; missing detectors; abnormal sensor values
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Privacy and security threats; safety risks for traffic management systems
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Serious safety, security and privacy concerns for traffic management and vehicle tracking

use_cases.name: AI system to quality control of electronic medical record (EMR) in real time
use_cases.description: NLP-based system for real-time EMR quality control and error detection
use_cases.narrative: Achieves 80% coverage of EMR QC requirements and reduces human labor by 60% while ensuring completeness and medical compliance
use_cases.challenges: Achieving all EMR QC requirements; lack of medical reference data and knowledge graphs
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Privacy and security of EMR data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Cost savings and enhanced physician education; EMR data privacy

use_cases.name: Machine learning tools in support of transformer diagnostics
use_cases.description: Operation and maintenance of power transformers
use_cases.narrative: The successful use of ML tools may find multiple applications in the industry such as providing fast ways of analysing new data streaming from online sensors
use_cases.challenges: Data availability, missing data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Safe and reliable power delivery

use_cases.name: Automated travel pattern recognition using mobile network data for applications to mobility as a service
use_cases.description: Automatic travel pattern recognition from anonymized and aggregated mobile phone network data
use_cases.narrative: Activity-based modelling has the capability to exploit big data generated by smart cities to create a digital twin of urban environments
use_cases.challenges: The use of mobile phone network data is still not precise for shorter trips and internal trips that cannot be detected
use_cases.deployment_model: Activity-based modelling for new mobility services
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: The use of anonymization techniques minimizes the risk of disclosing personal information

use_cases.name: Improving conversion rates and return on investment (ROI) with AI technologies
use_cases.description: Personalized digital marketing using big data and AI for audience targeting and recommendations
use_cases.narrative: Achieved 30%+ improvement in conversion rates, 10%+ cost reduction with 2% conversion increase, and 70%+ improvement in coupon recommendations
use_cases.challenges: Data collection and protection within legal frameworks; continuous system evolution
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Better service for users; increased profits for merchants; economic prosperity

use_cases.name: bioBotGuard
use_cases.description: Use visual recognition to identify and help fight parasites attacking organic farms
use_cases.narrative: BioBotGuard defines itself as an initiative of precision farming as a service. Uses drones with GPS and high-resolution cameras to monitor crops
use_cases.challenges: Acquire field as well as crop images at different distances and normalize image recognition and pattern detection
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: RAVE
use_cases.description: Use of advanced and multimodal sensing ability to facilitate a complex task
use_cases.narrative: The RAVE system is an integrated multi-agent system involving a robot and virtual human designed to augment language exposure for 6-month-old to 12-month-old infants
use_cases.challenges: Ability to decode a learner's cognitive status and his/her attention level
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Logo and trademark detection
use_cases.description: Identification of logos/trademarks in pictures, optionally performing sentiment analysis associated with the product
use_cases.narrative: The case is about being able to identify logos and trademarks in pictures provided to the AI systems, and optionally derive a positive or negative sentiment toward the product
use_cases.challenges: Correctly identify trademarks in all situations and interpret sentiment and tone in different countries and languages
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Automated analysis of public posts on social networks can be seen as unethical in certain cultures

use_cases.name: Virtual bank assistant
use_cases.description: Chatbot system for automating bank call center activities
use_cases.narrative: Handles 100% of requests with 90%+ user satisfaction, reducing service desk operator time by 25% across 14 knowledge domains
use_cases.challenges: Providing natural interaction for users with different experience levels
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Video on demand publishing intelligence platform
use_cases.description: Predictive maintenance platform for video content preparation processes
use_cases.narrative: E2E platform using ML for fault prediction and reinforcement learning for recovery recommendations in video publishing workflows
use_cases.challenges: ML engine processing time requirements
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Predictive testing
use_cases.description: Automatic detection of inaccurate test outcomes in an application development process
use_cases.narrative: The solution adopts machine learning to analyse event logs of test results in order to reduce the number of wrongly failed tests
use_cases.challenges: Being able to manage and handle different types of data, and integrating the solution in the processes and procedures of the company
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Missing actual failures due to incorrect predictions
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Predictive data quality
use_cases.description: A solution for assessing data quality in data collection systems
use_cases.narrative: The solution adopts machine learning methods to analyse collected data in order to identify complex correlation of data and predict data quality issues
use_cases.challenges: Being able to manage and handle different types of data, link data to a reference knowledge model, and change management in the organization
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Poor data quality affecting decision making
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Robot consciousness
use_cases.description: A robot for museum tours equipped with the main capabilities of functional consciousness
use_cases.narrative: The 'CiceRobot' is a robot with capabilities associated with functional aspects of consciousness offering indoor and outdoor guided tours
use_cases.challenges: The transparency and acceptance of robot operations, important in environments populated by untrained people
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: The main concern can be the capability of the robot to act in a way that can be considered unethical to humans

use_cases.name: AI sign language interpretation system for people with hearing impairment
use_cases.description: Increase the convenience of public services to people with hearing impairment by providing a service to translate sign language image information into natural language
use_cases.narrative: In this use case scenario, people with hearing impairment and people without disabilities are able to communicate with each other through the AI sign language-natural language interpretation service
use_cases.challenges: Multimodal interactions, translation from visual information to textual information, translation from textual information to visual information
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Promoting welfare and supporting social activities for people with disabilities

use_cases.name: Dialogue-based social care services for people with mental illness, dementia and the elderly living alone
use_cases.description: Daily life support AI services that provide an interaction with humans using natural language
use_cases.narrative: Daily life support services based on artificial intelligence conversation technology that can perform information processing tasks through natural language conversation with users
use_cases.challenges: Multimodal data handling-based multimodal interaction, multimodal data analysis, multimodal data-based inferences
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Promoting welfare and supporting social activities for people with mental illness, dementia and the elderly

use_cases.name: AI situation explanation service for people with visual impairments
use_cases.description: A real-time situation explanation service through voice for people with visual impairments
use_cases.narrative: A daily life support service, based on artificial intelligence technologies, that can explain the situation around people with visual impairments while they move
use_cases.challenges: Vision
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Promoting welfare and supporting social activities for people with visual impairments

use_cases.name: Social humanoid technology capable of multi-modal context recognition and expression
use_cases.description: Human-AI sympathetic technology expressing dynamic immersive dialogue with humans
use_cases.narrative: A highly immersive sympathetic conversation technology based on artificial intelligence that includes integrated understanding and expression skills of verbal, non-verbal and para-verbal information
use_cases.challenges: Multimodal data understanding/inference/representation
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: The increase in the elderly population and the decrease in the total population are increasing inequality

use_cases.name: Expansion of AI training dataset and contents using artificial intelligence techniques
use_cases.description: Data self-propagation and validation service for deep learning and contents services
use_cases.narrative: The service expands the data used for deep learning for rapid commercialization of artificial intelligence technologies
use_cases.challenges: The optimized self-propagation techniques for various types of data
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Poor quality synthetic data affecting model performance
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Technology polarization in the artificial intelligence technical area is becoming more serious

use_cases.name: Pre-screening of cavity and oral diseases based on 2D digital images
use_cases.description: Artificial intelligence-based oral examination platform
use_cases.narrative: This service utilizes artificial intelligence technology to analyse oral conditions by sending oral images to the diagnostic server without the user having to visit the dentist
use_cases.challenges: Dental image processing using artificial intelligence
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Elimination of inequalities in regional health care services

use_cases.name: Real-time patient support and medical information service applying spoken dialogue system
use_cases.description: Medical business support system using artificial intelligence-based human-computer interface technology
use_cases.narrative: The service is a medical system that provides patient information and related data for treatment in real time based on a voice dialogue interface
use_cases.challenges: Dialogue service in medical data and knowledge, question and answering by a medical expert system, remote speech recognition
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Improving medical service efficiency and patient satisfaction

use_cases.name: Integrated recommendation solution for prosthodontic treatments
use_cases.description: Support complicated prosthetic treatments according to the patient's condition using AI technology
use_cases.narrative: This service includes sufficient dental knowledge and patient data for prosthodontic treatment, and uses a variety of artificial intelligence techniques
use_cases.challenges: Discovery of satisfying solutions based on medical knowledge and clinical data, reasoning out of novel cases
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Improving medical service efficiency and patient satisfaction

use_cases.name: A judging support system for gymnastics using 3D sensing
use_cases.description: Skeleton recognition for gymnastics
use_cases.narrative: We have been developing a judging support system for artistic gymnastics to enhance accuracy and fairness in judging using skeleton recognition technique
use_cases.challenges: Recognize a skeleton performing all gymnastics elements, recognize a 3D skeleton performing complex gymnastics movements from a depth image
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Fairness of scoring, reducing the burden on the referee, and technical improvement of the gymnast

use_cases.name: Active antenna array satellite
use_cases.description: Determine optimal spot beam patterns for communication satellites to react to changing geographic distribution and bandwidth requirements
use_cases.narrative: Future high throughput satellites would be equipped with an active antenna array instead of a fixed multiple spot beam pattern
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Potential to provide demand-adapted service coverage in sparsely populated areas

use_cases.name: Carrier interference detection and removal for satellite communication
use_cases.description: Machine-learning-based detection, classification and removal of interference signals for satellite communication systems
use_cases.narrative: In satellite communication systems, unintended or intended interferences are quite common. The intention is to detect the presence of an interferer and potentially classify it
use_cases.challenges: Performance and robustness probably need to be defined with reference to a certain class of signals
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Jet engine predictive maintenance service
use_cases.description: Use of jet engine telemetry data to train predictive maintenance algorithms
use_cases.narrative: ML-based jet-engine predictive maintenance technology predicts the next maintenance tasks proactively using a machine learning model trained by jet engine telemetry data
use_cases.challenges: Explainability and transparency regarding the training data used, from the perspective of corporate confidentiality concerns
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect maintenance predictions affecting flight safety
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Ability for industry players to share their data while protecting their IP

use_cases.name: Sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS)
use_cases.description: Use of facial recognition in healthcare
use_cases.narrative: ML-based facial recognition technology detects when an infant is lying on his/her back or face down, alerting the care taker to intervene
use_cases.challenges: Explainability and transparency regarding the training data used, need for structured way to describe ML model training process
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Racial and ethnic biases in the trained model
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Cost and availability for low income populations, unintentional bias affecting effectiveness

use_cases.name: Cooking recipes without border (CRWB) recommendation benchmark
use_cases.description: Decision support for cooking recipe execution plans, and nutrition recommendation
use_cases.narrative: The recommendation benchmark is based on a cooking recipe dataset of cooking recipe execution plans
use_cases.challenges: Personal expectations related to flavour, taste and texture
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Inappropriate recipe recommendations for dietary restrictions
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Local production for local consumption

use_cases.name: Flavorlens
use_cases.description: Sharing of multi-sensing dish tasting experiences in a social media ecosystem
use_cases.narrative: Social network to enable sharing of dish tasting experiences
use_cases.challenges: Personal expectations related to flavour, taste and texture
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Local healthy dishes that provide user satisfaction and meet preferences

use_cases.name: Water crystal mapping
use_cases.description: Similarity classification of water crystals for quality monitoring
use_cases.narrative: Classifies 5,007 crystal photos into 13 categories using deep learning, with 20K photos for production to monitor water quality
use_cases.challenges: Using classification results to enhance water quality
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Trustworthy ML evaluation planned for 2022-2023

use_cases.name: Ontologies for smart buildings
use_cases.description: Renovation of a building, improvement of the quality of life of the residents
use_cases.narrative: The general question is how to build and standardize ontologies for data produced, in a broad sense, in a building
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Discharge summary classifier
use_cases.description: Classification system for hospital discharge summaries
use_cases.narrative: Uses morphological analysis and correspondence analysis to generate keyword rankings, with random forest achieving best performance
use_cases.challenges: Reducing computational complexity; refining medical texts; enhancing hospital management
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Quality of AI system; patient data privacy

use_cases.name: Generation of clinical pathways
use_cases.description: Temporal data mining for clinical care pathway construction and maintenance
use_cases.narrative: Four-step process using clustering and multidimensional scaling to extract nursing order patterns and construct optimal care pathways
use_cases.challenges: Reducing computational complexity; enhancing hospital management
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Good medical practice while protecting patient privacy

use_cases.name: Hospital management tools
use_cases.description: Temporal data mining for hospital service innovation and management
use_cases.narrative: Applies clustering and temporal frequent item sets to hospital data for improving service quality through data reuse
use_cases.challenges: Reducing computational complexity; enhancing hospital management
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Good medical practice while protecting patient privacy

use_cases.name: Improvement of productivity of semiconductor manufacturing
use_cases.description: AI-based analysis of production equipment data for yield improvement
use_cases.narrative: Processes 2 billion daily records from 5000+ equipment pieces, improving wafer map classification to 0.95 F1-score and reducing analysis time from 7 days to 1 day
use_cases.challenges: Guaranteeing AI analysis correctness; automatic physical model building
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Delay in analysis due to inaccurate AI; delay in countermeasures
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Productivity improvements; accountability, security and reliability challenges

use_cases.name: An intelligent marking system
use_cases.description: AI-based automated grading system for subjective questions
use_cases.narrative: Reduces manual marking costs by 50% while providing scientific, unified scoring standards for compositions, translations, and short answers
use_cases.challenges: Improving marking accuracy further
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Fair scoring standards; impacts on teacher roles

use_cases.name: Intelligent educational robot
use_cases.description: Interactive robot for children's education and learning enhancement
use_cases.narrative: Provides teaching materials, corrects bad habits, trains oral English, and cultivates good learning behaviors through AI interaction
use_cases.challenges: Sensing student emotions like teachers; accurately capturing gestures and facial information
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Emotional support for students; transparency and explainability of robot actions

use_cases.name: AI system to intelligent campus
use_cases.description: Comprehensive intelligent system for teaching, examination, evaluation, management and learning
use_cases.narrative: Integrates teaching, examination, learning and management with AI-powered course arrangement, oral evaluation, and personalized learning paths
use_cases.challenges: Data privacy protection for large-scale student and teacher data collection
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Privacy data disclosure for teachers and students
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Impact on AI users (teachers and students); campus AI integration effects

use_cases.name: Product failure prediction for critical IT infrastructure
use_cases.description: Deep learning model for predicting defective hardware batches in IT manufacturing
use_cases.narrative: Augments QA engineers by providing consistent labeling of defective batches, improving customer satisfaction and reducing returned merchandise
use_cases.challenges: Identifying best deep learning model; indexing raw files into visualization images
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Model compromise due to input data changes
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Sustainable manufacturing; high-value technical jobs

use_cases.name: Predicting relapse of a dialysis patient during treatment
use_cases.description: Deep learning model to predict patient relapse probability during dialysis
use_cases.narrative: Reduces patient trauma by predicting 10% relapse rate, providing consistent decisions for nurses on whether to start dialysis sessions
use_cases.challenges: Feature engineering for prediction model retraining without high compute requirements
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect vital stats equipment can lead to inaccurate predictions
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Healthcare accessibility; patient data privacy

use_cases.name: Improving the quality of online interaction
use_cases.description: Recommendation engine for chat interfaces to suggest relevant ideas for users
use_cases.narrative: Operates live in dating platform chat interface to help users decide on mutual interest activities, translating sociological interventions upstream
use_cases.challenges: Translating sociological theories to Singapore context; data labeling for NLU
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Improper use compromising mutual respect and dignity

use_cases.name: Instant triaging of wounds
use_cases.description: Computer vision model for wound assessment using RGB and infrared imaging
use_cases.narrative: Uses 2MP mobile camera and IR attachments to visualize wounds within seconds, helping nurses make faster triaging decisions
use_cases.challenges: Integrating RGB and IR models into single interpretable visualization
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Poor lighting or camera damage can cause inaccurate visualizations
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Nurse shortfalls; medical imaging technology access; patient privacy

use_cases.name: Detection of fraudulent medical claims
use_cases.description: ML model to classify fraudulent insurance claims for third-party administrators
use_cases.narrative: Moves from human-only to computer-assisted fraud detection, identifying anomalies in claims due to patient, doctor, or collusion fraud
use_cases.challenges: Developing separate models for each major fraud source
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Model may not detect new fraud modes if features aren't updated; patient privacy risks
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Preventing misuse of funds; serious patient privacy concerns

use_cases.name: Forecasting prices of commodities
use_cases.description: Neural network for forecasting base metal commodity prices
use_cases.narrative: Uses structured market data and unstructured social media data to improve price forecasting accuracy and trading trends interpretation
use_cases.challenges: Modeling neural network with large, diverse data while calibrating short vs long-term impact variables
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Social media data access policy changes requiring model rebuilding
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Unpredictable commodity flows due to price shocks

use_cases.name: Dynamic routing software as a service (SaaS) based on artificial intelligence
use_cases.description: ML model for real-time delivery route optimization
use_cases.narrative: Dynamically corrects routes in real-time considering traffic, weather, and driver behavior to optimize delivery operations
use_cases.challenges: Feature engineering static/dynamic variables; over-reliance on internet connectivity
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Heavy reliance on real-time data connectivity; vehicle privacy and security risks
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Resource over-utilization and greenhouse gas emissions; serious vehicle privacy/security concerns

use_cases.name: Non-intrusive detection of malware
use_cases.description: ML model for malware detection without accessing personal device data
use_cases.narrative: Interprets phone activities like battery, data usage, location services to flag malware without accessing personal information
use_cases.challenges: Model limitations as malware attacks are highly sophisticated and not easily detectable
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Model updates needed for new applications; privacy risks from learning and interaction data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Disparate cyber-attack sources; significant privacy concerns for detection systems

use_cases.name: Predictive maintenance of public housing lifts
use_cases.description: Build an AI solution that can predict malfunction in a lift
use_cases.narrative: An AI model that helps the facilities management company of public housing to move from reactive to predictive maintenance of lifts
use_cases.challenges: The model can at times predict false positives, which can lead to unnecessary deployment of repair and maintenance manpower
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: False positive predictions leading to unnecessary maintenance
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Disruptions to the public due to breakdown of shared infrastructure

use_cases.name: Tax rules updates and classification
use_cases.description: Build an AI solution that identifies updates on tax laws and classifies them
use_cases.narrative: An NLP model that helps an investment firm identify tax laws and trends that have an impact on their current and future portfolio
use_cases.challenges: The classes are pre-determined, and if these are changed, it would affect the ability of the model to re-classify
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Misclassification of tax laws affecting investment decisions
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Erratic changes in local and cross-border tax rules, which have repercussions on economic growth

use_cases.name: Ecosystems management from causal relation inference from observational data
use_cases.description: Infer important latent variables to control a whole ecosystem using a database including human observation and sensor data
use_cases.narrative: We can find diverse relations between climate, animals and plants that infer an ecologically consistent structure
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.deployment_model: Cloud services, on-premise systems, embedded systems, hybrid
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: No poverty; Zero hunger; Good health and well-being; Clean water and sanitation; Climate action; Life on land

use_cases.name: System for real-time earthquake simulation with data assimilation
use_cases.description: This system provides accurate information for evacuation in an earthquake disaster
use_cases.narrative: The system conducts large-scale simulation of 3D seismic wave propagation, and results are improved based on real-time data assimilation using observation and machine-learning
use_cases.challenges: Construction of a reasonable and realistic underground model for simulation, real-time earthquake simulation with data assimilation
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect earthquake predictions affecting public safety
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Earthquake disasters

use_cases.name: Data compression with AI techniques
use_cases.description: Data centres/Supercomputing centres
use_cases.narrative: Improving data compression with a deep predictive neural network for time evolutional data
use_cases.challenges: More accurate prediction of data to be compressed
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Data loss due to compression errors
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure

use_cases.name: Optimization of software configurations with AI techniques
use_cases.description: Data centres/Supercomputing centres
use_cases.narrative: Optimizing asynchronous multi-level checkpoint/restart configurations with machine learning
use_cases.challenges: More accurate prediction for optimization
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Industry, innovation, and infrastructure

use_cases.name: Better human-computer interaction with advanced language models
use_cases.description: Human-computer interaction
use_cases.narrative: Better language models are crucial for improving the quality of human-computer interaction; for example, tasks like question answering and summarization
use_cases.challenges: High computational costs
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Partnerships for the goals

use_cases.name: Accelerated acquisition of magnetic resonance images
use_cases.description: Innovations in MRI image formation
use_cases.narrative: Recent advances in sparse raw signal acquisition and specific image reconstruction show that it is possible to significantly reduce the acquisition time
use_cases.challenges: It is necessary to guarantee quality for all possible combinations of MRI sequence parameters, anatomical areas, and patient cohorts
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: MRI imaging would be used more often, increasing radiologists' workloads

use_cases.name: AI adaptive learning platform for personalized learning
use_cases.description: Cloud-based e-learning platform using AI for adaptive learning paths
use_cases.narrative: Creates interactive educational content with real-time feedback, suitable for private classes to MOOCs, designed for computer science education
use_cases.challenges: Including edstories for movement-based learning; verification of new content
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Legal boundaries for school integration; fairness of educational opportunities; transparency and predictability

use_cases.name: AI based text to speech services with personal voices for people with speech impairments
use_cases.description: All people who have some sort of speech impairment
use_cases.narrative: A personal wearable device is capable of online-synthesizing voice over text or correcting distorted speech
use_cases.challenges: Minimization of source records to create a synthesized voice, hardware requirements for voices based on neural networks
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: SDGs: Good health and well-being for people

use_cases.name: AI decryption of magnetograms
use_cases.description: AI system for detecting pipeline defects and structural elements from magnetometer data
use_cases.narrative: Reduces pipeline diagnostics process by 160x through automated recognition of internal defects and structural elements from robot sensor data
use_cases.challenges: Achieving high accuracy in defect and weld recognition; reducing magnetogram processing time
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Environmental risk prevention; accountability, security and reliability for responsible technology application

use_cases.name: AI platform for chest CT-scan analysis (early stage lung cancer detection)
use_cases.description: AI platform for early stage oncology chest CT-scan diagnosis and pathology risk assessment
use_cases.narrative: Achieves 93% detection rate for malignant neoplasm with 4-6 minute processing time, supporting radiologists and oncologists
use_cases.challenges: Achieving higher confidence level than accredited radiologists
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Loss of trust in AI system
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Patient data privacy protection

use_cases.name: AI virtual assistant for customer support and service
use_cases.description: Automated customer question answering system integrated with internal business systems
use_cases.narrative: Achieves 85% service automation, handles 1M+ requests monthly 24/7, integrated with billing, CRM, and product catalog systems
use_cases.challenges: API readiness of external systems; customer bias against chatbots; security and privacy risks
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Information security and privacy of client data; communication secrecy
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Serious security and privacy concerns for client profiles and question history

use_cases.name: AI-based design of pharmacologically relevant targets with target properties
use_cases.description: AI-based engineering of G protein-coupled receptors with enhanced stability
use_cases.narrative: We developed an innovative AI-based digital platform for GPCR design, which allowed for a technological breakthrough in obtaining spatial structures of GPCR
use_cases.challenges: Biophysical data is typically very noisy, and the results critically depend on the used experimental assay and initial conditions
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect protein designs affecting drug development
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Discovery of more efficient, safer and personalized drugs

use_cases.name: AI-based mapping of optical to multi-electrode catheter recordings for atrial fibrillation treatment
use_cases.description: Predicting possible targets for atrial fibrillation ablation based on explanted human heart data
use_cases.narrative: We predicted the possibility of AF drivers to be visible in the MEM recording as trained by the optical ex-vivo data
use_cases.challenges: There is only one laboratory in the world that provides the needed explanted human atria. The number of experiments is limited
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect driver location affecting treatment success
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Better life quality for atrial fibrillation patients, diminishment of stroke accidents

use_cases.name: AI-dispatcher (operator) of large-scale distributed energy system infrastructure
use_cases.description: Monitoring, optimization and control of large-scale distributed energy systems using deep reinforcement learning
use_cases.narrative: An AI solution is currently in development that uses hybrid models, 'digital twins,' and deep reinforcement learning to support decision making and control of energy infrastructure systems in real-time
use_cases.challenges: To achieve a high level of efficiency of complex energy system optimization, to learn from human-beings, to employ meta-learning techniques
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Safety, security and reliability of AI solutions used in energy infrastructure management

use_cases.name: Analysing and predicting acid treatment effectiveness of bottom hole zone
use_cases.description: Digital assistant for predicting acid treatment effectiveness in oil/gas wells
use_cases.narrative: Predicts effectiveness of acid treatments with 80%+ convergence using mathematical models and ranking wells by treatment effectiveness
use_cases.challenges: Achieving high accuracy prediction of acid treatment efficiency
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Environmental risk prevention; accountability, security and reliability for responsible application

use_cases.name: Application of strong artificial intelligence
use_cases.description: Economic sectors and social services
use_cases.narrative: Strong artificial intelligence is a digital twin of human intelligence, capable of learning, retraining, self-realization and development
use_cases.challenges: Qualitatively new type of thinking not available to humans
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Security and ethical and legal aspects

use_cases.name: Automatic classification tool for full size core
use_cases.description: Classification of rock types, oil saturation, carbonate and fracture from core images
use_cases.narrative: Reduces core image analysis by 80% and typing time from 2 weeks to 3 days using ML mechanisms for daylight and UV images
use_cases.challenges: Achieving lithologist expert-level accuracy; minimizing laboratory tests through visual recognition
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Quality of images from special equipment
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Environmental risk prevention; accountability, security and reliability for responsible application

use_cases.name: Autonomous trains [unattended train operation (UTO)]
use_cases.description: Freight and passenger trains operate autonomously, excluding any crew presence on board
use_cases.narrative: UTO enables unattended operation of trains according to schedule. The system is responsible for the train's acceleration, braking, speed control, station departure
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Safety, reliability, security, potential job loss

use_cases.name: Financial advice and asset management with AI
use_cases.description: AI system for portfolio management and financial crisis prediction
use_cases.narrative: Manages exchange-traded securities portfolios using asset price and macroeconomic data, outperforming traditional approaches like SCORE/PROCAM
use_cases.challenges: Data can be noisy with missing values; requires high reliability computing systems
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Changes in state financial activity regulation
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: AI solution for end-to-end processing of cell microscopy images
use_cases.description: Restoration of naturally distorted microscopy images for following visualization and analysis of meaningful patterns
use_cases.narrative: We aim to implement AI methods throughout the pipeline of microscopy cell image restoration and analysis. We plan to implement AI approaches for the extraction of meaningful patterns
use_cases.challenges: Effective localization of living cells without losing meaningful information, multilayer 3D objects require more computational time and resources
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect cell analysis affecting research results
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: The developed method is applicable to a wide range of biological and biomedical tasks

use_cases.name: Generation of computer tomography scans from magnetic resonance images
use_cases.description: Train a model that generates CT images from MRI scans. Synthetic CT images can be used for radiation dose calculation
use_cases.narrative: Here, we generate synthetic computed tomography images from real magnetic resonance imaging data. The MRI-CT translation approach holds the potential to eliminate the need for patients to undergo both examinations
use_cases.challenges: Large amounts of paired MRI-CT data are not easily available, doctors are reluctant to accept synthetic CT scans
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect synthetic images affecting treatment planning
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Savings for oncologic patients. Reduced radiation dosage

use_cases.name: Improving the knowledge base of prescriptions for drug and non-drug therapy and its use as a tool in support of medical professionals
use_cases.description: Providing the medical professional with methods and means for high-quality choice of drugs and prescription formulation
use_cases.narrative: Services are developed to improve the efficiency and quality of medical care using AI methods for knowledge base improvement
use_cases.challenges: The existence in parallel of several clinical recommendations used by doctors, difference in information between clinical recommendations and instructions for medical usage
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Reduce risks of erroneous prescriptions, improve quality of medical care

use_cases.name: Unique case from 2021 not in 2024
use_cases.description: Placeholder for unique 2021 cases not overlapping with 2024

use_cases.name: Loan in 7 minutes
use_cases.description: Completely automated loan decision system using AI in minutes
use_cases.narrative: Makes credit decisions in minutes without human participation using complex ML on Hadoop cluster with tens of petabytes of data
use_cases.challenges: Nonlinear models with big data need significant computational power during training
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Gender and racial bias concerns; fairness in lending decisions; no user appeal mechanism

use_cases.name: AI contract management
use_cases.description: Automated business process solution for contract data classification, extraction and monitoring
use_cases.narrative: Standardizes contract management, improves quality of problematic contracts/claims, and optimizes lawyers' workflows by relieving routine tasks
use_cases.challenges: Noisy data from variable scan quality; working with private data; computational power needs
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Security and privacy threats; bias from requirement changes or inappropriate training data
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Optimizes contract management and assists legal departments

use_cases.name: Neural network formation of 3D-models orthopaedic insoles
use_cases.description: AI system for constructing individualized medical 3D insoles to reduce musculoskeletal disease risk
use_cases.narrative: Converts foot scans into anatomically correct 3D insoles using AI decision-making based on medical history and anthropometric data
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Patient data privacy protection

use_cases.name: Open spatial data set for developing AI algorithms based on remote sensing (satellite, drone, aerial imagery) data
use_cases.description: Analytical services for automatic detection of ground surface object changes
use_cases.narrative: Provides geo-analytical cloud services for urban monitoring, emergency mapping, and security monitoring using remote sensing data and AI
use_cases.challenges: No standard for labeling remote sensing images with geographic reference; need for georeference, time series, cartographic labeling
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Privacy and security threats; accountability challenges
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Global technology extension brings new situational awareness and resource management possibilities

use_cases.name: Unique case placeholder
use_cases.description: Reserved for additional unique cases

use_cases.name: AI adaptive learning mobile app
use_cases.description: Foreign language learning mobile program that adapts to students using AI
use_cases.narrative: Analyzes user social network data to create individual training plans, monitors progress, and provides adaptive curriculum with virtual teacher
use_cases.challenges: Developing personalized learning approach
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Making education accessible; impact on teacher roles; student bias and verification considerations

use_cases.name: Unique case placeholder
use_cases.description: Reserved for additional unique cases

use_cases.name: Real-time segmentation and prediction of plant growth dynamics using low-power embedded systems equipped with AI
use_cases.description: Low-power embedded system with AI for real-time plant segmentation and growth prediction
use_cases.narrative: Autonomous system for greenhouses and remote areas achieving 180-day operation on Li-ion battery with 4cmÂ² RMSE in 3-hour prediction horizon
use_cases.challenges: Plant growth data depends on multiple factors; need for high accuracy with low parameters for embedded systems; data diversity
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Hidden patterns; incorrect AI system use
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Improving data quality by adjusting for environmental conditions

use_cases.name: Search of undiagnosed patients
use_cases.description: Deep semantic analysis of unstructured texts to find undiagnosed patients with orphan diseases
use_cases.narrative: Extracts knowledge from patient forums, professional networks, and health portals using semantic AI tools to identify patient journeys
use_cases.challenges: Personal health data of patients potentially at risk
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: AI system reliability can deteriorate with symptom description fluctuations

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: A clinical decision support system
use_cases.description: AI system for cardiovascular disease risk prediction screening
use_cases.narrative: Outperforms traditional approaches (SCORE, PROCAM, Framingham) using both traditional risk scales and neural network models for CVD risk
use_cases.challenges: Providing physician tools to easily calculate cardiovascular risk globally
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: AI system errors causing patient injury; data availability issues; privacy concerns; bias and inequality
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: 'Black box' transparency concerns; difficulty educating doctors on AI tool usage

use_cases.name: Device control using AI consisting of cloud computing and embedded system
use_cases.description: AI system to learn user temperature preferences for automated air conditioning control
use_cases.narrative: Hybrid cloud-embedded ML system that learns user temperature preferences across different situations and automatically adjusts air conditioning
use_cases.challenges: Significant model differences between cloud and embedded learning; detecting and explaining differences
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect models from mischievous/misunderstood operations; usage pattern leaks on resale; cloud threats
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Performance efficiency and accountability; security and responsibility for consumer digital markets

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: Symptom assessment (hypothetical)
use_cases.description: AI system to support patients and doctors with pre-diagnosing health problems
use_cases.narrative: Addresses global health worker shortage (7.2M to 12.9M by 2035) by providing AI-based symptom assessment for pre-clinical triage
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.deployment_model: Mobile applications accessing AI backends running on cloud platform. Stand alone offline mobile applications
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Incorrect diagnosis/triage; insufficient robustness; inadequate patient context consideration
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: System escalates cases to human doctors based on pre-clinical triage when not 100% reliable

use_cases.name: AI-based optimized field dispatch
use_cases.description: Deep learning optimization of field engineer dispatch decisions for network problems
use_cases.narrative: Reduces false dispatch by using DL to predict which trouble tickets require field engineers vs. remote resolution, saving OPEX costs
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Lost OPEX saving opportunities from unnecessary field dispatches
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Wireless network failure prediction
use_cases.description: AI-based wireless core network failure prediction system
use_cases.narrative: Uses auto-encoder with LSTM to learn normal traffic patterns and predict abnormal traffic before serious network failure occurs
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Missing symptoms that could lead to serious wireless network damage
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: None identified

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: Smart agriculture
use_cases.description: Platform providing personalized crop management information to farmers
use_cases.narrative: Analyzes weather, crop protection, pest and agronomic data to provide effective agricultural solutions for better land utilization
use_cases.challenges: Algorithm fallibility; natural regional variations; one-size-fits-all limitations; precise record keeping; data security
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Data accuracy; privacy and security concerns; reverse engineering of algorithms
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Affordable and easy-to-use tool; environmental protection alignment; data ownership by farmers

use_cases.name: Customer relation management (CRM)
use_cases.description: Analysis of ethical issues in using AI for customer relationship management
use_cases.narrative: Uses big data and AI in CRM to manage customer databases and improve interactions, identifying ethical issues like autonomy, privacy, bias, and trust
use_cases.challenges: Lack of customer knowledge about data usage; realistic informed consent guidelines; addressing privacy risks
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Informed consent challenges; GDPR vs non-EU regulations; autonomy and manipulation concerns
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Protecting customers from exploitation; examining ethical issues in new CRM advances
