use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: AI services for health insurance companies
use_cases.description: Analysis of AI technology providers for health insurance companies and evaluation of ethical issues
use_cases.narrative: Examines AI use in fraud detection, risk management, and marketing for health insurers, identifying ethical gaps between literature and practice
use_cases.challenges: Job losses concern
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Data accessibility limitations; authentication and security challenges
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Discrimination through sophisticated AI; divergence from societal objectives for equity and solidarity

use_cases.name: Business use of IoT for surveillance
use_cases.description: Analysis of ethical issues in IoT-based software for monitoring employees and customers
use_cases.narrative: Examines ethics of IoT tracking software for business use, comparing design and usage ethical issues with literature and legislation
use_cases.challenges: No official policy for system abuse cases after detection through logs
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Privacy concerns; access control risks; potential for malicious use despite safeguards
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Transparency through activity logs but no violation response mechanisms

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: Predictive risk intelligence
use_cases.description: AI-based risk prediction for supply chain, insurance, finance, sustainability and medicine
use_cases.narrative: Uses ML to analyze media streams and detect risk events days/weeks before they happen across various domains globally
use_cases.challenges: Same as threats and vulnerabilities
kpis: Accuracy of risk event detection days/weeks in advance
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Privacy concerns from social media data use; transparency and fairness issues; trust and accuracy concerns; bias from client selection
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Privacy and data governance issues with social media data usage for risk analysis

use_cases.name: Smart city
use_cases.description: Evaluation of ethical issues in smart information systems implementation in smart cities
use_cases.narrative: Examines four smart city projects (complaints AI, parking chatbot, data exchange platform, open-source algorithm) and their ethical challenges
use_cases.challenges: Economic pressure as cities still in early development stages while monetary benefits increasingly linked to smart efforts
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Data ownership and control issues; inequalities and job replacement; privacy concerns from tracking technologies
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Need for stakeholder inclusion in development; incorporating citizens into design and implementation

use_cases.name: Smart energy grid
use_cases.description: Analysis of ethical issues in smart information systems use in smart grids
use_cases.narrative: Explores ethical issues in smart grids and active demand systems that optimize energy management through dynamic pricing and consumption monitoring
use_cases.challenges: Sustainability vs energy cost of smart technologies; prioritization of energy distribution and justice
kpis: Accuracy of energy demand and supply optimization
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Cyber-risks and security threats to energy infrastructure
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Privacy and informed consent issues; affordability and energy equity concerns; GDPR privacy concerns

use_cases.name: Making using evidence-based medicine and AI
use_cases.description: Clinical decision support system based on AI analysis of medical texts
use_cases.narrative: Processes medical texts, standards, guidelines, and EHR to ensure medical decisions in pharmacotherapy with 94% AI accuracy and 30% medical error reduction
use_cases.challenges: None identified
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Correct diagnosis in >90% of cases vs 80% clinician success; prevents medical errors

use_cases.name: AI-service for blood cells and bone marrow scans analysis
use_cases.description: Automated microscopic blood and bone marrow scan analysis using AI service
use_cases.narrative: Automates routine analysis of 34 blood/bone marrow cell types with 92-99% accuracy, assisting doctors in abnormality detection
use_cases.challenges: Lack of digital diagnostic equipment; lack of digital transformation skills
kpis: Report with cell labeling and interpretation
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Ethical concerns mitigated by limiting AI conclusion statements to prevent harm

use_cases.name: AI-service for chest X-ray and chest CT
use_cases.description: Automated chest X-ray and CT analysis for pulmonary pathology detection including COVID-19
use_cases.narrative: Supports radiology departments with 10-second analysis speed, 87% accuracy, 94% sensitivity, and 86% specificity for pathology detection
use_cases.challenges: Scaling challenges with on-premise installation model
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Ethical concerns mitigated by limiting AI conclusion statements; normal scans can be autonomously identified

use_cases.name: Intelligent video analytics system
use_cases.description: Intelligent monitoring system for patient safety using computer vision
use_cases.narrative: Monitors patient safety and care quality, reducing neglect, falls, and bedsores while protecting patient information with 95% accuracy
use_cases.challenges: Additional CAPEX for healthcare facilities
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Securely protecting patient information

use_cases.name: Reserved for additional cases
use_cases.description: Placeholder

use_cases.name: Retrospective analysis
use_cases.description: Analysis service for lung CT archives from COVID-19 pandemic for nodule detection
use_cases.narrative: AI algorithms perform automatic segmentation for various nosologies, providing rapid preliminary diagnosis with ROC/AUC >0.91
tasks: Prediction of nodules in lung scans
use_cases.challenges: CT device calibration deviations; lack of MIS-CT integration; medical specialist required for interpretation
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Medical data security; standard protocols required; rare disease findings possibility
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Secure data transfer; data depersonalization; ease of use for physicians

use_cases.name: Forecasting of crop yield using decision support system
use_cases.description: AI system for increasing farm productivity through yield prediction and operational adjustment
use_cases.narrative: Addresses global food production challenge (50% increase needed by 2050) using ML with 5.7% average error for farm-level and 15% for field-level predictions
use_cases.challenges: AI solves resource and labor scarcity; provides tool for coping with agricultural complexity
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Algorithm fallibility; data disparities; natural regional variations
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Accuracy achieved for trained territories; lower accuracy possible in other regions

use_cases.name: Robotization of the federal hotlines on COVID-19 issues
use_cases.description: Robot-operator for federal COVID-19 hotline providing 24/7 information without human operators
use_cases.narrative: Processes 100% of citizen appeals without queue, contains 1,500 Q&As on COVID-19, with <10 sec call waiting and <2 sec response delay
use_cases.challenges: Low-quality data from background noise and poor connections
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Regular AI training needed through journalist/editor involvement for current morbidity situation
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Fault tolerant with 99.9% SLA; accommodating new COVID-19 knowledge challenge

use_cases.name: Use of computer vision innovative technologies for analysis of medical images and further application
use_cases.description: Implementation of AI-based services in unified radiological information service for city healthcare
use_cases.narrative: Testing and implementing AI services across 103 medical facilities with 1,029 diagnostic devices, analyzing 4M studies with 65% radiologist satisfaction
use_cases.challenges: AI integration into national guidelines; development of financing mechanisms for medical insurance
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Functional and diagnostic requirements developed; >250 labeled datasets created; step-by-step testing methodology

use_cases.name: AI performance evaluation of AI-powered messaging bots
use_cases.description: AI system to evaluate messaging bot conversation quality using numerical ratings
use_cases.narrative: MACS system provides 1-3 scale ratings for bot conversations, processing 600K conversations in 45 minutes across 3 regional servers
use_cases.challenges: Model predicts negative states, doesn't track improvements; limited to English; accuracy passable at aggregate level
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Implicit annotator biases; security threats; potential for reverse engineering conversation text
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Bias mitigation through diverse accounts and annotator training; PII masking for privacy

use_cases.name: AI tool for species categorization for wildlife population monitoring
use_cases.description: Automated AI tool for species segregation from camera trap images for conservation monitoring
use_cases.narrative: Classifies 38 species from Indian forests with near-perfect recall for tigers/leopards using Faster-RCNN and SVM ensemble approach
use_cases.challenges: Training vs field data discrepancy; outlier images from human operators and vehicle transport during camera movement
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Higher recall requirement even at lower precision for endangered species population estimation
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Location information encrypted to prevent poacher misuse; 4-year data collection cycle for security

use_cases.name: AI system for promoting DX in customer attraction services at a museum
use_cases.description: AI system for digital transformation in museum customer attraction services
use_cases.narrative: Uses IC cards/QR codes for visitor interaction, learning KGI/KPI/KFS structures via Bayesian networks for improved navigation and content
use_cases.challenges: Continual DX improvement means periodic review and format changes for data collection/analysis
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Concerns about inappropriate recommendations due to poor user estimation

use_cases.name: Collaborative AI to assist workers with production and assembly in factories
use_cases.description: Autonomous robotic hands for manufacturing assistance in routine tasks like inspection, assembly, sorting
use_cases.narrative: Robotic hands for conveyor belt/assembly line work with environment mapping, object tracking, and gesture control across multiple use cases
use_cases.challenges: Operation errors from incorrect process/environment definitions; sensor accuracy; human interaction errors
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: System malfunction; unforeseen events; security threats
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Security, safety, performance efficiency; user controllability; robustness for operator integrity; modular design for maintainability

use_cases.name: Video surveillance
use_cases.description: AI system for recording/streaming videos under network bandwidth and hardware memory constraints
use_cases.narrative: Replaces human-monitored screens with neural network capabilities for object detection, tracking, segmentation, action recognition, and pose estimation
use_cases.challenges: Traditional coding not optimal for machine vision; increased front-end cameras impose heavy back-end computational loads
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Explainability and transparency through visible object features (type, location, trajectory)

use_cases.name: Detect pickpockets in a crowd - training with privacy-sensitive data
use_cases.description: AI system to detect abnormal situations and alert first responders in crowded areas
use_cases.narrative: Helps security staff detect pickpockets using hundreds of CCTV cameras, requiring training with thousands of hours of video data
use_cases.challenges: Regulations (GDPR) prioritize privacy protection even with negative security impact; unlawful to collect videos beyond intended purpose
kpis: >50% detection accuracy to avoid operator rejection
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Unlawful video collection beyond intended purpose; GDPR restrictions on data retention
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Humans remain in loop to limit uncontrolled bias; unlawful data collection beyond intended purpose

use_cases.name: Misbehaviour detection (MBD) for V2X
use_cases.description: AI system for monitoring V2X communication infrastructure security against cyber-attacks
use_cases.narrative: MBD system with local/global detection and reaction capabilities to prevent cyber-attacks that could cause traffic jams or targeted accidents
tasks: Recognition via on-board local and cloud-based global detection
use_cases.challenges: Privacy-preserving secure reporting; real-time global attack detection; reaction function for misbehaving stations
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: New security/privacy attack axes; detection accuracy; data bias from training location; malicious revocation of genuine vehicles
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Security concerns including new attack vectors like revoking genuine vehicles

use_cases.name: AI system to estimate or predict congestion length for traffic signal control
use_cases.description: AI system for traffic congestion length estimation/prediction to minimize vehicle detectors and reduce costs
use_cases.narrative: Learns correlation between traffic volume and travel time to estimate congestion from minimal detectors, expected to halve total detector count
use_cases.challenges: Traffic environments not included in learning data (accidents)
kpis: Signal control performance (delay time, congestion length)
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Travel time output can be continuously verified with probe data

use_cases.name: Traffic signal control using artificial intelligence
use_cases.description: Adaptive autonomous distributed traffic control system for Society 5.0 era
use_cases.narrative: Establishes low-cost advanced traffic signal technology using AI for automated driving era, contributing to sustainable road traffic society
use_cases.challenges: More sophisticated algorithms; lower maintenance costs
use_cases.deployment_model: Traffic signals, distributed networks and LTE
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Safety, security and privacy risks for traffic management systems and vehicle tracking
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Camera/radar sensing accuracy maintenance; serious safety, security and privacy concerns

use_cases.name: AI system for digital marketing in retail services
use_cases.description: AI system to improve matching probability and customer satisfaction in retail through digital marketing
use_cases.narrative: Uses smartphone app with questionnaires and purchase history, applying PLSA and Bayesian networks for product recommendations with discount coupons
use_cases.challenges: Continual improvement means periodic review and format changes for data collection
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Concerns about inappropriate recommendations due to poor user estimation

use_cases.name: AI system for predicting rivers' water levels during flooding
use_cases.description: Real-time water level prediction system for flood countermeasures and evacuation planning
use_cases.narrative: Predicts water levels every 10 minutes up to 6 hours ahead using current data and meteorological forecasts, supporting evacuation decisions
use_cases.challenges: Improving response speed; extending predictable time and river basin coverage
use_cases.threats_vulnerabilities: Rainfall exceeding model capabilities; incorrect sensor data affecting accuracy
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Impact on residents as AI assists evacuation advisory decision-making

use_cases.name: AI system with a digital knowledge centre for utilizing the knowledge in the organization
use_cases.description: AI system establishing digital knowledge center for IT service operation and maintenance support
use_cases.narrative: Digitizes skilled staff knowledge using networking technology, knowledge inspection, and fit/gap analysis for organizational knowledge utilization
use_cases.challenges: Enhancing knowledge center establishment/maintenance performance; improving usability for support work
kpis: Knowledge consolidation accuracy and processing time
use_cases.trustworthiness_considerations: Impact on support staff employment; potential for unemployment due to AI system
